data.title: A Site to A Pocket Nova Pulse
data.description: This is a good nova pulse to concuss enemies playing in A Pocket allowing you to swing and get a frag.

data.title: B Hall to B Hookah Nebula
data.description: This is a good nebula for B Hookah to dissipate and cross to site without being seen.

data.title: B Site to B Hookah Gravity Well
data.description: This is a good gravity well and nova pulse combo to completely disorient your target and get a kill.
